LanguageData.EngravedStoneDesc: A natural {0} wall that's been smoothed and engraved with an artistic pattern.
LanguageData.DesignatorEngraveWallDesc: Designate a smoothed stone wall to be engraved. This requires artistic skill rather than construction skill. Pawns with higher artistic skill are more likely to actually produce art.
LanguageData.SurfaceBeingEngraved: The wall is already marked for engraving.
LanguageData.MessageMustDesignateSmooth: Must designate a smoothed stone wall.
